{"id":674576787,"lang":"swift","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1649188953,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"41 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/674576787/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Shuffle String","memory":"14.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    func restoreString(_ s: String, _ indices: [Int]) -> String {\n        let sCount = s.count\n        let sArray = Array(s)\n        var output = Array(repeating: \"\", count: sCount)\n        \n        for i in 0..<sCount {\n            let index = indices[i]\n            output[index] = String(sArray[i])\n        }\n        \n        return output.joined()\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"shuffle-string"}
